lead_paragraph: Manchester United have shown they are capable of playing an attractive and attacking brand of football in their recent games, midfielder Juan Mata said after Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw at his former club Chelsea.

headline.print_headline: United Showing They Can Play Attractive Football-Mata
headline.main: United Showing They Can Play Attractive Football-Mata

snippet: Manchester United have shown they are capable of playing an attractive and attacking brand of football in their recent games, midfielder Juan Mata said after Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw at his former club Chelsea....
